snippet.title: SHIELD GAMING: Metal Gear Solid 2
snippet.description:
Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty HD Edition is a timeless stealth-action classic which defined the tactical espionage genre back in 2001, and now it’s available on NVIDIA SHIELD TV.

Learn more here: http://nvda.ws/2uy0eTb
